__doc__: JSON describing an 8-ball pool trickshot. Size describes the type of table this should be played on. polygons describe the lines that should be drawn/projected on the table. balls: Each has its coordinates in x and y in mm, starting from the upper left of the table.
name: Triple
description: Sink three balls with one straight on hit.

cue.__doc__: JSON describing the position of the cue and its power on a scale of 0 to 1 (quite the subjective measurement). start and end subject describe two points of the que

hit.__doc__: JSON describing the point where the cue should hit the ball on the back of the white ball. x and y coordinates from the top left of a square of the ball
